name: ancient-brass-dragon-xmm
prompt: heroic tabletop fantasy (D&D 5e adjacent), grounded medieval-fantasy materials, culturally coherent gear, no modern tech or signage, consistent painterly collection style, Illustration of ancient-brass-dragon-xmm, highlight musculature and unique limbs, include human silhouette, three-color palette, underwater/sky/merged zone, depict motion, detailed concept art, aquatic fantasy realism, subsurface caustics, bioluminescent accents, pressure-dome materials, palette: teals, deep blues, sea-greens, pearl highlights, Use specified aspect/resolution; avoid artifacts., Avoid embedded text or words unless specified; never render gibberish strings., Avoid garbled or random letter strings; keep any symbols meaningful or use numbered pins., Avoid sci-fi UIs, modern signage, photoreal CGI, anime style, bloom glare.
alt_text: Concept art of ancient-brass-dragon-xmm with anatomy, scale, and environment.
revised_prompt: Detailed concept art styled after tabletop fantasy settings like D&D, with an emphasis on realism, molded by a three-color palette of teals, deep blues, and sea-greens. The illustrating scene is a mix between an underwater kingdom and the sky, containing caustic light patterns from water surfaces and bioluminescent accents. An ancient brass dragon with highlighted musculature and unique limbs, all crafted out of medieval-fantasy materials, towers above a human silhouette cast in pearl highlights for contrast. The dragon, adorned in culturally coherent gear with no signs of modern technology, is positioned inside a protective pressure dome. The background and the dragon's positioning should depict motion, evoking a scene of the dragon in action. Make sure to avoid modern signage, photoreal CGI, sci-fi UIs, anime style, bloom glare, and random letter strings. Ensure to maintain image clarity by preserving the specified aspect/resolution and avoiding artifacts.
